Recipe.Name: TinyMCE Toolbar Extension
Recipe.Author: Laser srl
Recipe.Description: Set up TinyMCE with TextColor and Blockquotes.

TinyMceSiteSettingsPart.InitScript: selector: "textarea.tinymce", theme: "modern", schema: "html5", convert_urls: false, valid_elements: "*[*]", // Shouldn't be needed due to the valid_elements setting, but TinyMCE would strip script.src without it. extended_valid_elements: "script[type|defer|src|language]", //menubar: false, //statusbar: false, skin: "orchardlightgray", language: language, auto_focus: autofocus, directionality: directionality, toolbar: "undo redo cut copy paste | bold italic | bullist numlist outdent indent formatselect | alignleft aligncenter alignright alignjustify blockquote ltr rtl | medialibrary link unlink charmap | forecolor code fullscreen", plugins: ["advlist, anchor, autolink, autoresize, charmap, code, colorpicker, contextmenu, directionality, emoticons, fullscreen, hr, image, insertdatetime, link, lists, media, nonbreaking, pagebreak, paste, preview, print, searchreplace, table, template, textcolor, textpattern, visualblocks, visualchars, wordcount, medialibrary"], textcolor_map: [ "CC2121", "Rosso", "FE6D4C", "Pesca", "1DA1F2", "Azzurro", "81CA33", "Verde" ]
